name: MANAV Foundation
briefDescription: Under the umbrella of the MANAV Foundation, is the Manav Rehabilitation Centre, a day care therapeutic set up for the psychosocial rehabilitation of adults suffering from mental illnesses and emotional disorders. This facility is accessible by any adult individual, who due to a mental condition or illness, personality and/or emotional disorder has not been able to successfully function within mainstream society, and is in need of prerequisite and enabling care.
